ack.p: The authors acknowledge State University of Maringá/Núcleo de Pesquisas em Limnologia, Ictiologia e Aquicultura and Australian Rivers Institute/Griffith University for providing the institutional infrastructure. We are also very grateful to Federal University of Technology – Paraná (UTFPR), Campus Campo Mourão for paying for the Open Access publication. We thank Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico (CNPq) for continuous support to AAA. We thank Stuart Bunn and Jon Olley for their leadership of the Ecological Responses to Environmental Flow Regimes Cluster Project. Michael Wilson from the Murray-Darling Basin Authority kindly provided access to the Sustainable Rivers Audit (SRA) fish records. Paul Wilson from the Victorian Department of Environment, Land, Water, and Planning provided access to Victorian fish surveys records. We also thank Matheus T. Baumgartner for the grid confection.
